original_title: The Lights of Old Santa Fe
overview: The Brooks Rodeo, run by Gabby Hayes, is on the verge of being appropriated by competitor Frank Madden (Tom Keene), who also has his eye on lovely rodeo owner Marjorie Brooks (Dale Evans). Now good-guy Roy and old-timer Gabby must figure out a way to one-up Madden, save the rodeo, and prevent innocent Marjorie from marrying the vile villiain.
title: The Lights of Old Santa Fe
